title: Drawing, "Sideboard", ca. 1934
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at upper margin, center: Radio Cabinet Hinges?; inscribed in graphite circled at lower right: 9011/SIDEBOARD; inscribed calculations, dimensions, instructions
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation for low, boxy sideboard, probably wood. Rectangular shape with cabinet on far left and right side; vertical pulls near center. Three stacked horizontal drawers at center with narrow pulls at center. Sideboard on four low, strap (metal ?) feet with rounded piece.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sideboard", ca. 1934.
ca. 1934. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-117.
